name: bj-dvdemo2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2

stmt.origin: eximii(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
stmt.pretty: eximii(s0, (s0 = s1 → s2 ∈ s0), s2 ∈ s0)

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
-| wex(s0, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
-| wex(s0, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))

|- wex(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s2)

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s2)

comment: Remove dependency on ~ ax-13 from ~ dvdemo2 (this removal is noteworthy since ~ dvdemo1 and ~ dvdemo2 illustrate the phenomenon of bundling). (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
